Dedication To Colt
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Dedication To Colt
By blackdevil on Tuesday, August 15, 2006 - 04:29 am:

To the tune of "Graduation"The Chorus by Vitamin C


Where is Co-olt
The Good Trainer
I need to-oo
Shoo-oot her
So She Willl-ll-l
Burn In @$#%
But I will Stil-ll
Train my monsters...
